title: Value of the global eyewear market from 2018 to 2025
yAxis: Market value in billion U.S. dollars
summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Market value in billion U.S. dollars. In total the number of data points it has is 8.
Overall Market value in billion U.S. dollars has increased over the Year.
Market value in billion U.S. dollars is slightly increasing from 2018 to 2025.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2024 and 2025.
Maximum Market value in billion U.S. dollars, about 210.87 was reported at Year 2025
The lowest Market value in billion U.S. dollars, of value 131.32 was reported at Year 2018
